pageTitle: ICC Cricket World Cup 2015 matches, scorecards, preview, history, news and statistics - Cricbuzz
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {4265=The Cricket World Cup 2015 witnessed some mesmerising bowling performances. From Mitchell Starc to Trent Boult to Wahab Riaz, there were quite a few awe-inspiring spells., 8805=Mustafa Kamal, the President of International Cricket Council (ICC), has reportedly decided to quit. This comes days after he was snubbed from the ICC Cricket World Cup 2015 final post-match ceremony.}
